name: Verify that the API vaccination record will be successful updated by batch file upload
description: /home/runner/work/imms_fhir_api_automation/imms_fhir_api_automation/features/batchTests/update_batch.feature: Verify that the API vaccination record will be successful updated by batch file upload
descriptionHtml: /home/runner/work/imms_fhir_api_automation/imms_fhir_api_automation/features/batchTests/update_batch.feature: Verify that the API vaccination record will be successful updated by batch file upload

testStage.description: /home/runner/work/imms_fhir_api_automation/imms_fhir_api_automation/features/batchTests/update_batch.feature: Verify that the API vaccination record will be successful updated by batch file upload

attachments.name: Step Passed: I have created a valid vaccination record through API
Step Passed: The delta and imms event table will be populated with the correct data for api created event
Step Passed: An update to above  vaccination record is made through batch file upload
Step Passed: batch file is uploaded in s3 bucket
Step Passed: file will be moved to destination bucket and inf ack file will be created
Step Passed: inf ack file has success status for processed batch file
Step Passed: bus ack file will be created
Step Passed: bus ack will not have any entry of successfully processed records
Step Passed: Audit table will have correct status, queue name and record count for the processed batch file
Step Passed: The imms event table will be populated with the correct data for 'updated' event for records in batch file
Step Passed: The delta table will be populated with the correct data for all updated records in batch file

labels.name: suite
labels.value: Create the immunization event for a patient through batch file and update the record from batch or Api calls

labels.name: feature
labels.value: Create the immunization event for a patient through batch file and update the record from batch or Api calls
